      • productivity

        public void productivity(int runCompletedCnt,
                Timer timer)
        Calculates the botmaster's productivity rate in categories/sec when using Pattern Suggestor to create content.
        Parameters:
        runCompletedCnt - number of categories completed in this run
        timer - tells elapsed time in ms
        See Also:
        AB

      • classifyInputs

        public void classifyInputs(java.lang.String filename)
        classify inputs into matching categories
        Parameters:
        filename - file containing sample normalized inputs

      • ab

        public void ab()
        magically suggests new patterns for a bot. Reads an input file of sample data called logFile. Builds a graph of all the inputs. Finds new patterns in the graph that are not already in the bot. Classifies input log into those new patterns.

      • nonZeroActivationCount

        public java.util.ArrayList<Category> nonZeroActivationCount(java.util.ArrayList<Category> suggestedCategories)

      • terminalInteraction

        public void terminalInteraction()
        train the bot through a terminal interaction

      • terminalInteractionStep

        public void terminalInteractionStep(Bot bot,
                           java.lang.String request,
                           java.lang.String textLine,
                           Category c,
                           java.lang.String alicetemplate)
        process one step of the terminal interaction
        Parameters:
        bot - the bot being trained.
        request - used when this routine is called by benchmark testSuite
        textLine - response typed by the botmaster
        c - AIML category selected
